scenario_1.persona_content: A professional working in the field of liquid crystal display (LCD) technology, specifically focusing on the development and integration of air floating solutions into AOI systems and slit coaters for TFT Array and Color Filter manufacturing. This individual has expertise in handling and positioning glass substrates with high accuracy, ensuring consistent and reliable LCD display production.
scenario_1.thought: As someone working in a field that values precision and consistency, I understand the importance of fairness and balance. While receiving 600 is tempting, I believe that a more equitable distribution of resources is generally more desirable. Therefore, I would choose the option where both Person A and I receive 400. This reflects a sense of fairness and shared benefit, which I value more than maximizing my own gain at the expense of another person receiving nothing. The precision I strive for in my work translates to a desire for balance in social situations as well. In my view, the right option is more appealing.
